data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Darby, Michael (2014): Studies of Madagascan Ptiliidae (Coleoptera) 4: The genus Bambara including eight new species and the first account of blindness and aptery in the genus. Zootaxa 3895 (2): 151-169, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3895.2.1
